sentences.en: Please bleep the doctor on duty immediately.
sentences.cn: 请立刻用传呼机召值班医生.

sentences.en: Suddenly his computer made a loud noise:'BLEEP, BLEEP.'
sentences.cn: 突然,他的电脑发出一阵很大的噪音: “ 哗,哗, 哗. ”

sentences.en: The computer gave a regular bleep.
sentences.cn: 计算机发出有一定节律的哔哔声.

sentences.en: The microwave will bleep when your meal is ready.
sentences.cn: 烹调结束时，微波炉会发出哔哔的声音。

sentences.en: The timer on the cooker started to bleep.
sentences.cn: 炉灶上的定时器哔哔地响了起来。

sentences.en: When we turned the boat about, the signal began to bleep again constantly.
sentences.cn: 当我们把船调头的时候，信号器又不停地发出哔哔声。

trans.tran_en: a short high sound made by a piece of electronic equipment
to make a high electronic sound
